> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> "What I've done?"thougth the femme, then she spoke "What will happen with
> me, Milord?"
>
> She tried to show confidence but under her calmed face she was uneasy and
> waited what Magmatron would say

<NEW>

There wicked smile from SABERBACK as he watched NIGHTLIGHT, seeming to
take some pleasure out of her discomfort. He folded his arms over his
chest

However it was MAGMATRON who answered. "You will be held here in my
demesne until I have further need of you, and I suspect I will." There
was only the slightest of a smile, "You will help me to . . . how
shall I say this delicately . . . motivate your husband to do as he
should."  MAGMATRON gestured at DARK RODIMUS.

There was a strange glow in DARK RODIMUS' optics as he looked at
MAGMATRON, "You have given me your word that should would remain
unharmed."

There was a chuckle as MAGMATRON leaned back in his chair, "And that
she will, I promise."

MAGMATRON's words did not sound quite as sincere as they should, but
DARK RODIMUS nodded taking what he could get. "Of course sir." he
said.

"Take her to your quarters and keep her there until we send for her."
MAGMATRON said as he waved at DARK RODIMUS dismissively.

DARK RODIMUS turned to leave, his arms still protectively on NIGHTLIGHT.

(TAG)

Preston
